nodes.text: Belly of the Beaast was a roleplaying-game adventure in year three of the Living Force campaign. It was the third adventure of the Metatheran Caution trilogy and was written by Morrie Mullins and edited by Jae Walker.
The heroes are sent by the Cularin Militia to the planet Caarimon, where they attempt to stop a Believer plot to release a virus into the atmosphere.
